com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.argument
Class ByteArgs

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.argument.ByteArgs

public final class ByteArgs
extends Object

Static methods to check byte arguments.

See ObjectArgs for an overview.

Author:
Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)
